specialServiceTypes.description:
Indicate the types of special services requested for the shipment.
click here to see Package Special Service Types

signatureOptionType.description:
Indicate the Signature Type.
Valid Values:
  • ADULT - Adult signature required, at recipient address.
  • DIRECT - Signature required, at recipient address.
  • INDIRECT - Signature required, alternate address is accepted.This option is available for residential deliveries only
  • NO_SIGNATURE_REQUIRED - Signature is not required.
  • SERVICE_DEFAULT - Signature handled as per current Service Guide.

enhancementTypes.description:
The types of all enhancement for the Priority Alert.
Example: PRIORITY_ALERT_PLUS

content.description: Specifies Content for the Priority Alert Detail.

signatureOptionDetail.description: This element specifies Signature option details.

alcoholRecipientType.description:
Specify the Alcohol Recipient Type of the shipment.
Example:
  • LICENSEE- FedEx approved alchol shipper having appropriate licenses.
  • CONSUMER- Individual consumer to whom the alchol is shipped.

shipperAgreementType.description: Specify the type of entity, the shipper for alcohol shipment is registered such as fulfillment house, retailer or a winery.

alcoholDetail.description: These are detcontentails for the package containing alcohol. This is required for alcohol special service. The alcoholRecipientType is required.

accessibility.description:
Specify Dangerous Goods Accessibility Type.
  • Inaccessible – it does not have to be accessable on the aircraft.
  • Accessible – it must be fully accessible on the aircraft, and is more strictly controlled.

options.description: Indicate type of DG being reported.

amount.description:
This is the amount. Maximum limit is 5 digits before decimal.
Example: 12.45

currency.description:
This is the currency code for the amount.
Example: USD
Click here to see Currency codes

packageCODDetail.description: These are COD package details. For use with FedEx Ground services only; COD must be present in shipments special services.

batteryDetails.description: Provide details about the batteries or cells that are contained within this specific package.

batteryPackingType.description: Describe the packing arrangement of the battery or cell with respect to other items within the same package.

batteryRegulatoryType.description: This is a regulation specific classification for the battery or the cell.

batteryMaterialType.description: Indicate the material composition of the battery or cell.

units.description: Indicate the weight unit type. The package and commodity weight unit should be the same else the request will result in an error.

value.description:
This is the weight. Maximum length is 99999.
Example: 68.25

dryIceWeight.description:
These are the package weight details.
Note: Weight is not required for One rate shipments

description: These are special services that are available at the package level for some or all service types.
